tool.help:
**Note**
contigStats is an experimental tool currently under test that just reports some simple contig stats for fasta files containing contigs from assemblies
----
**What this tool does**
This tool takes any number of fasta files and returns a report showing some basic assembly contig stats for all sequences
eg, it might report something like: #Measure Value N25 537 N50 335 N75 252 mean_contig_len 347.0 median_contig_len 276.0 max_contig_len 6923 contig_count 1393 mean_contig_gc_pct 43.88 ----
